EmailTemplate.name: 202103_Americas_MSP_for_Channel_Partners.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Maintenance Service Plan Webinar for Channel Partners, March 23
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Join Honeywell’s Sales Managers Karen Martinez and Adela Rehakova for our upcoming webinar – Maintenance Service Plan (MSP) Components – Avionics and Mechanical.
Designed specifically for our Honeywell dealers, this webinar will provide an overview of MSP base programs (Avionics and Mechanical Systems), extended and third party programs and benefits, dealer resources and dealer discounts.
After attending this webinar, you'll be well versed in understanding the program´s value proposition, features and coverage options, available platforms, pre-requisites and requirements for enrollment, and benefits for customers.
DATE March 23, 2021
TIME 8:00 AM PDT 11:00 AM EDT
LOCATION Online and On-Demand
REGISTER NOW <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2021/03/honeywell-msp-webinar-for-channel-partners]]>
